scripts.init: npm run link && npm run install:all
scripts.test: npm run test:logger & npm run test:clib & npm run test:slib & npm run test:sapp
scripts.link: npm run link:core && npm run link:logger && npm run link:clib && npm run link:capp && npm run link:slib && npm run link:sapp
scripts.link:logger: cd ../m2l-node-logger && npm link && npm link m2l-core
scripts.link:clib: cd admin-client/admin-client-lib && npm link && npm link m2l-core
scripts.link:capp: cd admin-client/admin-client-app && npm link m2l-core admin-client-lib
scripts.link:slib: cd admin-server/admin-server-lib && npm link && npm link m2l-core m2l-node-logger
scripts.link:sapp: cd admin-server/admin-server-app && npm link m2l-core m2l-node-logger admin-server-lib
scripts.install:all: npm run install:core && npm run install:logger && npm run install:clib && npm run install:capp && npm run install:slib && npm run install:sapp
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:logger && npm run build:clib && npm run build:capp && npm run build:slib && npm run build:sapp
scripts.build:dep: npm run build:core && npm run build:logger && npm run build:clib && npm run build:slib
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:logger" "npm run dev:clib" "npm run dev:capp" "npm run dev:slib" "npm run dev:sapp"
